Posts.Content: Oct 25, 2017 11:19AM pshughs wrote: I'm so glad to have found this message thread because I'm dealing with the exact same thing after my lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy (October 10, 2017) . The hyper sensitive skin is the worst. I'm pretty sure it's nerve damage and I hope it fades soon. In the meantime I found that compression helps, tight fitting shirts so that the clothing doesn't brush my skin. I would have thought the lumpectomy would have been more painful but that was a breeze compared to the sentinel node biopsy.
